DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess acceptability effectiveness utilizing vaginal self-swabs HPV DNA test compare provider-collected cervical swab HPV , well investigate prevalence Sexually Transmitted Infections ( STIs ) among sexually active female-to-male ( FTM ) transgender adult .
DOC.brief_title: Preventive Sexual Health Screening Among Female-to-Male ( FTM ) Transgender Adult Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study examine sexual health bio-behavioral cross-sectional mixed-methods design among 150 FTM patient Boston , Massachusetts , determine acceptability well collect epidemiologic data comparative performance characteristic several biological screen modality patient population . Patients stakeholder key partner throughout project involve phase study development , implementation , plan dissemination . Eligible participant participate one-time clinical visit . Following write consent , one-time clinical visit include : 1 ) Quantitative assessment ; 2 ) Collection biological specimens/biomarkers ( HPV DNA vaginal self-swab , HPV DNA cervical swab collect provider , Pap test cytology , STI test self- provider-collected ) ; 3 ) Qualitative Interview . A series national , online focus group FTMs , provider , key stakeholder occur gather information sexual health need FTM individual outside Boston area ensure dissemination study finding take differ demographic concern consideration .
